Package contextControllers

Class GenericContext

java.lang.Object
contextControllers.GenericContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
Credits, Delete, EasterEgg, GameOver, Load, Menu, NewGame, NextLevel, Options, Pause, Statistics, Tutorial, Win
public class GenericContext extends Object
Class for a generic Context, includes background image, fonts, avatars pictures and window dimension ( width and height)
